text:
NAEB HEADQUARTERS
14 Gregory Hall
Urbans, Illinois
TO: Board Members
FROM: H. J. Skomla
DATE: November 27, 1957
President Burton Paulu has asked if I would send each of you, as a basis
of brief review, a summary statement on the NAEB and its services.
Since I had done essentially this, recently, I am attaching a copy of
the summary presented at the International Seminar at Boston, This, with
some other articles of Hself-explanation* of the NAEB, will appear in
the February, 1958 issue of the NAEB Journal, as now planned. Editorial
comments will therefore also be welcomed, though the purpose, at this
time, is primarily to give you a quick review and overview of NAEB
functions.
Please also, if time, take another look at our Annual Report, sent you
earlier. It's the most complete one we've ever made. We do need to
do seme thorough homework.
and Others Attending the December 6-8 meeting in Chicago
HJS/dc
O
